name: autoshow
author: Anthony Campolo
description: An example workflow for automatically generating customizable show notes for audio and video files.

scripts.deno-as: npm run build && deno run --allow-sys --allow-read --allow-run --allow-write --allow-env dist/autoshow.js
scripts.v: npm run build && node --env-file=.env --no-warnings dist/autoshow.js --whisper large-v2 --video
scripts.u: npm run build && node --env-file=.env --no-warnings dist/autoshow.js --whisper large-v2 --urls
scripts.p: npm run build && node --env-file=.env --no-warnings dist/autoshow.js --whisper large-v2 --playlist
scripts.f: npm run build && node --env-file=.env --no-warnings dist/autoshow.js --whisper large-v2 --file
scripts.r: npm run build && node --env-file=.env --no-warnings dist/autoshow.js --whisper large-v2 --rss
scripts.last3: npm run build && node --env-file=.env --no-warnings dist/autoshow.js --whisper large-v2 --last 3 --rss
